name: Breethe: Sleep & Meditation
description: Breethe: Sleep & Meditation mobile application is the next generation meditation app that has the following features: sleep tracks, hypnotherapy sessions, masterclasses, music, nature sounds playlists, and much more.
goals: Create a cross-platform app to replace the existing Android and iOS applications.
solutions: We used NativeScript to create single codebase apps for both Android and iOS
We chose Angular 7, and with the help of NativeScript, compiled Angular application into native mobile apps
Provided access to camera, audio and video playing, storage, files, etc. through NativeScript APIâ€™s proxy to mobile native APIs
outcome: Cross-platform and easily maintainable meditation app to replace the existing Android and iOS applications.
